dialogue.text: Sometimes people ask me if I ever found myself. I tell them I found something better—I found that the seeking is the finding, the question is the answer, the dance is the dancer.

psychological_notes: Peak wisdom distilled into paradox—Evan articulates the ultimate insight that seeking/finding, question/answer, dance/dancer are unified. This represents complete transcendence of the original problem. The search didn't fail or succeed but revealed its own nature.
philosophical_underpinning: Non-dual recognition of process and entity as one
therapeutic_direction: Wisdom integrated and shareable with others
